page.title: 09The Barn Shop
page.content: The Barn Shop is a shop in Barby that sells Leather Clothes. The building is about 216 years old. The man who owns it has lived there for 8 years. The shop is a family business and the man would like his children to carry on after him. The leather comes from London. All the Sheepskin clothes are made at the shop. You can watch him working. The clothes seem very expensive but apparently they are much cheaper than in London because his overheads are so low by comparison. In the shop there are coats, hats, gloves, slippers, jackets and belts. It is possible to have things made to measure. The man's name is Glyn Roberts. The Barn Shop is very near the park in Barby and is a good place to go if you want to drive somewhere different at the weekend.
